content:
Please select the appropriate function and parameters from the following options based on the user's request. Please provide your response in JSON format.

Input: Resize the image to 800x600 pixels.

Available functions:
resize_image:
  description: Resizes an image to the specified dimensions.
  params:
    width: Width of the new image.
    height: Height of the new image.
analyze_text:
  description: Performs sentiment analysis on the provided text.
  params:
    text: Text to analyze.
filter_data:
  description: Filters data based on the provided condition.
  params:
    column: Column to filter.
    value: Value to filter by.
